entry.title: Christmas Day 16 oz candle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: 16 oz Candle
Price: 26.60

Selling out for the season, and going fast! This scent will not return until next year.

Christmas Day is a¬†Christmas celebration with top notes fresh pine, cozy balsam, and fir, blended with a heart of cinnamon sticks, clove, and soft hints of fruit and sweet oak moss.

BURN TIME + STRENGTH: Up to 64 hours of burn time. This spiced and earthy fragrance features a moderate strength that will have you reminiscing on beloved family traditions during this most joyful time of the year.

INGREDIENTS: Our candles are made in Lafayette, Indiana with a clean, long-lasting, and even burn thanks to high-quality materials.

  • 100% natural soy wax from domestically grown soy beans.
  • Premium fragrance oils (hand-picked by thousands of candle testers across the U.S.!)
  • 100% lead-free cotton wicks.
  • Paraffin free, dye free, and cruelty free. This fragrance is also phthalate and paraben free.

WEIGHT: 12.7 oz (359.2 g)

DIMENSIONS: 5‚Äù x 3‚Äù x 3‚Äù

Enjoy Christmas Day in additional sizes and products.
